tooltip.exampleOpeningLine: Access management tags help you apply flexible access policies on specific resources.

errors.exceeds_attach_limit: You've reached the maximum number of tags that you can attach at a single time. To attach more tags, save your changes first.
errors.exceeds_detach_limit: You've reached the maximum number of tags that you can detach at a single time. To detach more tags, save your changes first.
errors.tag_exists: This tag already exists. Enter another name for your tag.
errors.too_many_characters: A tag cannot include more than 128 characters.
errors.more_than_one_colon: A tag cannot contain more than one colon.
errors.starts_with_colon: A tag cannot start with a colon.
errors.ends_with_colon: A tag cannot end with a colon.
errors.invalid_characters: A tag can include only alphanumeric characters, spaces, underscores, dashes, periods and one colon.
errors.not_key_value_format: The tag name must be in a key:value format
errors.tag_not_found: No matches found. To create new tags, contact your tag administrator.
